meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing a methyl group and an aldehyde group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of methylals in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Methylals are commonly used in the production of certain medications.
meanings.sent3: When the methylals got mixed up, the experiment turned into a bubbly mess!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a mixture of methylals, complex yet intriguing.
meanings.sent5: The smell of methylals lingered in the air, sharp and distinct.

meanings.definition: A type of solvent used in industrial processes.
meanings.sent1: Workers wore protective gear while handling the strong methylals.
meanings.sent2: The factory relied on methylals to clean the machinery effectively.
meanings.sent3: The methylals seemed to dance in the container, almost like a tiny chemical party!
meanings.sent4: The efficiency of the team was like methylals, smoothly solving every issue.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering liquid of methylals reflected the lights, creating a mesmerizing sight.
